issue.title: [CF 658] Saving data fails
issue.body:
What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?

I configure TellMeWhen - copy some group from another character into current one, then I make some changes to this group (lots of). Everything works as intended. I get a critical error (unexpected shut down of the client). I start WoW client once again. Almost all data is lost - I see the copy of the group without any changes applied.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

6.0.3

Do you have an error log of what happened?

No lua errors. Just critical error of the client.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

I guess you keep data in local variables until the legal shut down of the client when all data is stored. I suggest to save the data immediately after applying changes or at least every X minutes.


> Posted by CurseForge user CuteBunny | Imported from CurseForge issue #658 | Raw

comments.body:
That's not how WoW works. Settings are only saved when you reload your UI, log out, or properly exit out of WoW. Its not something that addons have control of.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
